name: Data Recovery Experts
overview:
Data Recovery Experts is your local Data Recovery New York solution. We specializes in hard drive, RAID array and digital/flash storage media. Dont stress over lost data, give us a call today and see how hassle free data recovery can be!

Originally established in 1998 as a hard drive refurbishing facility we quickly realized the need for data recovery assistance and have been helping companies and individuals ever since.

We follow a strict no data, no charge policy; which means you dont pay unless we’re successful in recovering your data and ONLY if you’re satisfied with the recovery results. We also offer free diagnostics, within 24 hours.

We have helped thousands of individuals, companies and corporations alike recover what otherwise seemed lost. Dont hesitate, call and speak to one of our knowledgeable representatives today regarding your data loss situation.
